## createCylinder() function

创建 Cylinder Primitive 对象，此方法会根据 clampToGround 创建不同的对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createCylinder(
  options: CylinderOption
): Primitive | GroundPrimitive
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                         | Description   |
| --------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| options   | [CylinderOption](./cesium.cylinderoption.md) | Cylinder 参数 |

**Returns:**

Primitive \| GroundPrimitive
